Class UnaCloudAbstractMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • communication.UnaCloudAbstractMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentMessage, PhysicalMachineOperationMessage, VirtualMachineOperationMessage

    public abstract class UnaCloudAbstractMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class to be used by programs to send message to agents
    Author:
    Clouder
